response.overview: Three horrifying comic books arrive at the warehouse dock where unsuspecting Mike works. Curiosity gets the better of him as he opens them after being warned not to. Now the dangerous comic's come to life to and bring their terror to Mike in his world. Each page turned in the chilling tales get more real to Mike that include a handful of survivors in the aftermath of the Apocalypse, a Deadly Reaper who wants his revenge, and a broken soul of a father who struggles with his daughter after the death of his wife.
response.title: Cosgrove Chronicles
